mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_asset_borrowtype habt ON b.project_type = habt.borrow_cd AND bi.inst_code = habt.inst_code AND bi.asset_type = habt.asset_type AND habt.is_open = 1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_borrow b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender bt ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid WHERE b.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid}

SELECT b.borrow_nid AS investor, bt.user_name AS username, FORMAT(bt.account, 2) AS investment_amount, FORMAT(bt.account - bt.loan_fee, 2) AS loan_amount, FORMAT(bt.loan_fee, 2) AS service_charge, bt.client AS operating_deck, DATE_FORMAT( bt.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS operating_time FROM ht_borrow b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender bt ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid WHERE b.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid} ORDER BY bt.create_time DESC, bt.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT b.borrow_nid, bi.`name` AS borrow_name, b.borrow_user_name AS username, FORMAT(b.account, 2) AS account, CASE WHEN b.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, CONCAT(b.borrow_apr, '%') borrow_apr, b.borrow_style, bs.`name` AS borrow_style_name, b.borrow_valid_time, b.service_fee_rate AS borrow_service_scale, b.manage_fee_rate AS borrow_manager_scale, bi.borrow_manager_scale_end AS borrow_manager_scale_end, CASE WHEN verify_time IS NOT NULL AND verify_time != '0' THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.verify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS ontime, CASE WHEN b.borrow_full_time IS NOT NULL AND b.borrow_full_time != '' THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.borrow_full_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE FROM_UNIXTIME(b.verify_time + (b.borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 * 60), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') END AS over_time, FORMAT(b.borrow_account_yes, 2) AS borrow_account_yes, b.project_type, bpt.borrow_name AS project_type_name FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style bs ON bs.nid = b.borrow_style LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = CAST(b.project_type AS CHAR) WHERE b.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid}

SELECT FORMAT(SUM(bt.account), 2) AS investment_amount, FORMAT(SUM(bt.account) - SUM(bt.loan_fee), 2) AS loan_amount, FORMAT(SUM(bt.loan_fee), 2) AS service_charge FROM ht_borrow_tender bt WHERE bt.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid}

SELECT b.id, b.user_id, b.borrow_user_name, b.borrow_nid, bi.`name`, b.borrow_apr, b.account, b.borrow_period, b.borrow_style, b.borrow_full_status, b.borrow_full_time FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid WHERE b.`status` = 2 AND b.borrow_full_status = 1 ORDER BY b.create_time DESC

SELECT SUM(b.account) AS sumAccount, SUM(b.borrow_account_yes) AS sumBorrowAccountYes, SUM(b.borrow_service) AS sumServiceScale FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_asset_borrowtype habt ON b.project_type = habt.borrow_cd AND bi.inst_code = habt.inst_code AND bi.asset_type = habt.asset_type AND habt.is_open = 1
SELECT username FROM ht_r_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
